rules_text:
When this Vehicle enters, you may mill three cards. If you do, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Crew 1
notes:
PH Note 1.20: Mill to make junk. 2/3

#black #common
